Cardiff

13 February 2020

Tickets Sponsors

One Day. One Track. One Community

Speakers

The 2020 edition of ServerlessDays Cardiff brings us a broad array of speakers and topics. The Serverless developer and engineer skillset needs to be wider than ever. We need to create and maintain secure, performant, observable, maintainable systems. We also need to be looking out for what is coming next, to keep providing value to our organisations.

With this in mind we have a fantastic lineup already confirmed, looking at the opportunities afforded by serverless, best practices in migrating to serverless, options for addressing the pain points and enterprises sharing what theyâ€™re doing today in production. We hope the 2020 edition of ServerlessDays Cardiff will have something for everyone.

Venue

After the 2019 event sold out, ServerlessDays Cardiff is moving to an even bigger venue in the DEPOT
